title: Figure
description: Metal figurine of bald-pated man with top knot holding bow and brown enamel violin with gold strings and edging. Enameled costume: green jacket with gray blet, royal blue waistcoat with gold buttons, light blue breeches, white stockings with red and yellow mottling, black shoes. Threaded pin on base of left foot. Traces of gilding on neck, throat and violin bow.
name: Figure
